metadata.description: Enteric and autonomic reflexes coordinating gastrointestinal motility and evacuation.
metadata.notes: Qualitative representation of digestive reflex cascades only.

enterogastric.stimulus: Duodenal distension or acidic chyme presence.
enterogastric.afferent: Enteric sensory neurons and vagal afferents to brainstem.
enterogastric.integration: Enteric inhibitory circuits with vagal modulation reducing gastric motility.
enterogastric.efferent: Intrinsic enteric pathways and vagal efferents.
enterogastric.effector: Delayed gastric emptying and pyloric constriction.

vomiting.stimulus: Toxin detection, visceral irritation, or vestibular disruption.
vomiting.afferent: Area postrema chemosensors, vagal visceral afferents, and vestibular inputs.
vomiting.integration: Medullary vomiting center orchestrating respiratory and gastrointestinal muscles.
vomiting.efferent: Phrenic, spinal, and vagal motor outputs.
vomiting.effector: Coordinated retching and expulsion of gastric contents.

defecation.stimulus: Rectal wall stretch from fecal mass.
defecation.afferent: Pelvic nerve afferents to sacral spinal cord and enteric plexus.
defecation.integration: Sacral parasympathetic nuclei collaborating with enteric circuits.
defecation.efferent: Pelvic parasympathetic efferents and somatic pudendal pathways.
defecation.effector: Rectal contraction with internal sphincter relaxation and voluntary control of external sphincter.
